trans-unit.source: Represents a set of velocities calculated by the manipulation and inertia processors.
trans-unit.target: 表示由操作處理器和慣性處理器所計算出的一組速度。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationVelocities2D> object is used in the event arguments of <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulation2DDeltaEventArgs> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulation2DCompletedEventArgs> to inform the event handler of the velocities involved in the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationVelocities2D>的事件引數中使用物件<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulation2DDeltaEventArgs>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulation2DCompletedEventArgs>通知的事件處理常式時牽涉到操作中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the angular velocity, in radians per millisecond.
trans-unit.target: 取得角速度 (以每毫秒的弧度計)。

trans-unit.source: The angular velocity, in radians per millisecond.
trans-unit.target: 角速度 (以每毫秒的弧度計)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the expansion velocity along the x-axis, in coordinate units per millisecond.
trans-unit.target: 取得沿 X 軸的膨脹速度 (以每毫秒的座標單位計)。

trans-unit.source: The expansion velocity along the x-axis, in coordinate units per millisecond.
trans-unit.target: 沿 X 軸的膨脹速度 (以每毫秒的座標單位計)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the expansion velocity along the y-axis, in coordinate units per millisecond.
trans-unit.target: 取得沿 Y 軸的膨脹速度 (以每毫秒的座標單位計)。

trans-unit.source: The expansion velocity along the y-axis, in coordinate units per millisecond.
trans-unit.target: 沿 Y 軸的膨脹速度 (以每毫秒的座標單位計)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the velocity along the x-axis, in coordinate units per millisecond.
trans-unit.target: 取得沿 X 軸的速度 (以每毫秒的座標單位計)。

trans-unit.source: The velocity along the x-axis, in coordinate units per millisecond.
trans-unit.target: 沿 X 軸的速度 (以每毫秒的座標單位計)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the velocity along the y-axis, in coordinate units per millisecond.
trans-unit.target: 取得沿 Y 軸的速度 (以每毫秒的座標單位計)。

trans-unit.source: The velocity along the y-axis, in coordinate units per millisecond.
trans-unit.target: 沿 Y 軸的速度 (以每毫秒的座標單位計)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationVelocities2D" /> with all velocities set to zero.
trans-unit.target: 取得各個速度都設為零的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationVelocities2D" />。
